name: MoneyBag
description:
Type: Platformer

Code, Composition, and Art by Lexyvil.

You are a sentient gold bag that does not want its content to be spent. It is up to you to run away for freedom before the proprietor comes back. But at what cost?

This is a short game made with XNA/MonoGame in  47 hours over a weekend for the game jam Ludum Dare 44, with the theme being "Your Life is Currency".  

v1.0 is the Compo version.

v1.2 is the most recent, improved version.

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys 

Jump: Z

Reset: R
